divs: sighting detailsi saw these two orange over reddish lights flying one behind the other heading north to south crossing jericho turnpike at about 1 mile east of route 110 on 4\7\12 at 8:45 pm, in huntington station, ny. they made no noise and i realized immediately that they were very strange. misjudging their speed i attempted to run back in my house to get my camera. when i came back out about 15 seconds later the last of the two lights had entered the low ceiling clouds to the south of me, and disappeared before i could snap a picture. they were very bright and solid with an orange light on top and a smaller red light on the bottom. i am reporting this because i believe the there are many more people who witnessed this. they were very bright and solid with an orange light on top and a smaller red light on the bottom.

Summary: 2 Orange/Red glowing lights in succession over Huntington Station, NY
